name: Akaya Kanadaka
description: Akaya is a single weight experimental display typeface in Kannada, Telugu and Latin scripts. Akaya Kanadaka and Akaya Telivigala are made as two separate font files which share a common Latin. To contribute, please see github.com/vaishnavimurthy/Akaya-Kanadaka .
author: Vaishnavi Murthy, Juan Luis Blanco
